channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. stocks remain lower in final hour, as silver and gold pull back — live
Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq all close lower, as silver and gold pull back sharply
AI slop is taking over the internet — and it’s here to stay
Trump threatens to 'knock the hell' out of Iran if they build weapons
item.description: President Donald Trump threatened further military action against Iran during a Monday meeting at Mar-a-Lago with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Neta...

item.title: California's Ro Khanna faces Silicon Valley backlash after embracing wealth tax
item.description: A proposal to tax California billionaires at 5% of their wealth could land on the California ballot in November.

item.title: This silver-tracking ETF is having its worst trading session since 2020
Zelenskyy asks Trump for 50 years of security guarantees, says meeting with Russia possible
item.description: Ukraine's president, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, said Monday that he had asked for security guarantees for up to 50 years for Ukraine.

item.title: ‘The bulls are spooked’: Has silver’s stunning rise this year run out of steam?
Trump says ‘a lot closer’ to Ukraine peace deal after Zelenskyy meeting, though thorny issues remain
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was scheduled to arrive at Mar-a-Lago in President Donald Trump's latest attempt to end the war with Russia.

item.title: Zelenskyy meets Trump in Florida for talks on Ukraine peace plan
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and U.S. President Donald Trump met in Florida on Sunday to try to forge a plan to end the war in Ukraine.
